startingPosition.instruction: Lie flat on the back. Legs together and straight. Arms by the sides and palms down. Head, neck and spine in a straight line.

technique.instruction: Inhaling raise the right leg 5cm from the ground, keeping the knee straight. Other leg should remain straight and in contact with the floor.
Exhaling bend the right knee bringing the right thigh to the chest.
Inhaling raise the right leg straight up then lower the straight leg in a forward movement and return to step 1.
Inhaling raise the left leg 5cm from the ground, keeping the knee straight. Other leg should remain straight and in contact with the floor.
Exhaling bend the left knee bringing the right thigh to the chest.
Inhaling raise the left leg straight up then lower the straight leg in a forward movement and return to step 1.
Inhaling raise both the legs 5cm from the ground, keeping the knee straight.
Exhaling bend both the knees bringing the thighs to the chest.
Inhaling raise both the legs straight up then lower the straight legs in a forward movement and return to step 1.

info: Heel(s) should not touch the floor during the movement.
Deep breathing should be done and movement should be in sync with the breathing.
Gently push out the abdomen with inhalation and exhaling return to the starting position. Repeat 5 times.
